"T:A Wild Easter 2018":
"This is an emergency alert for all ARKS.
A large number of Phantoms and ESC-A
Darkers have been confirmed around the
Easter event venue construction site in
Las Vegas on planet Earth.
All ARKS are to dispatch and drive off the
enemies to ensure the safety of the area.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"

"We're about to transfer you.
Your objective is to eliminate
the hordes of Phantoms that
threaten the event venue!"

"For some reason, Phaleg
sent a message for you.
\"Long time, no fight.\"
...What's she doing on
the enemies' side?!"

"There might be some surprises in
store for us. For now, focus on driving
off the Phantoms and other enemies
to ensure the safety of the venue!"
